alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 1:28AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Rain and snow showers to continue across northern and central Nevada early this morning... Current radar imagery is showing rain and snow showers across the area. Snow levels are between 5500 and 6500 feet, depending on location. Webcams provided by the Nevada Department of Transportation is showing snow occurring at Emigrant Summit on I-80 with rain showers occurring in the cities of Elko and Wells with Jackpot possibly seeing a mix of rain and snow. Look for the wet weather to continue through this morning with minor snow accumulations of one-half inch possible in the valleys. Early morning drivers should be aware of rapidly changing weather due to elevation. Please use caution as slippery road conditions are likely and use low beams during low visibility situations. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
